p:
The Au core nanoparticles (45 nm diameter) were prepared by the citrate reduction process, following Frens method (
20 ). Briefly, 100 ml of 0.01 wt % HAuCl 4 aqueous solution in a 300-ml round-bottom flask was first heated to boiling, and then, 0.7 ml of 1 wt % Na 3 citrate aqueous solution was quickly added. The boiling solution turned its color from pale yellow to faintly blue within 30 s and then suddenly changes into burgundy after approximately 2 min of vigorous stirring. Boiling was continued for 40 min to complete reaction and then allowed to cool down to room temperature.
